revised_title: Investigating Large-Scale Ionospheric Irregularities and Their Directional Effects
tldr: This study investigates the direction-finding measurements of pulse signals reflected from the ionosphere, focusing on large-scale irregularities and their effects on radio wave propagation. The research explores the tilting and wrinkling of ionization density surfaces, as well as the horizontal movements in the ionosphere, which can impact the direction of propagation of reflected waves. The findings provide insights into understanding the complex behavior of the ionosphere and its impact on radio communication.
